channel.title: Badger41
channel.description: You may not know him, but [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=265468]badger[/url] is a great guy; he helps out a lot publicly and privately, he's been here a fair amount of time, and is a prime candidate for the veteran rank.

item.title: Badger41
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Why would he be active if he isn’t active now? Contribution is what I look for when I consider a vet, we cant verify anything if its ‘in private message’. What if even if he does help in PM it’s bad or wrong ways to do things? My vote is no, he just hasn’t shown us anything (that we can see at least) that would merit us even considering him for vet.

Read full topic

item.title: Badger41
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

The veteran section is horrible, isn’t it time to add some different, more active veterans?

Read full topic

item.title: Badger41
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

He has a lot of knowledge, that I cannot deny. I’m not too sure about his activity, but if it’s good, I think yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Badger41
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:461975”]Isn’t he more of a minecraft person? Just looking at his posts makes it seem like he doesn’t do much here anymore[/quote]He actually is active, just isn’t posting as much. He’s usually quite responsive via pm. He has a great deal of RSPS-related knowledge.

Read full topic
